job_description:
• Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related engineering discipline at a Spanish university, graduating in 2026 or 2027Strong understanding of object-oriented programming/design, algorithms, and data structures and how to efficiently implement them into a solution.

• Willingness to sign an NDA and work on a confidential projectCandidates must be legally authorized to work in Spain.
